definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: cotton (or fine linen (loan-word fr. Sk. karpâsa, cotton, Pers. karba0s fine linen; hence also ka/rpasov, carbasus, Ar. kirba0sun Talm. [[כָּרְפְּסָא]]; cf. Lag:Arm. Stud. § 1148);—[[וּתְכֵלֶת]] ´[[חוּר כ]] Es 1:6 (LXX karpasi/noiv): cf. Cels.:Hierob. ii. 157 ff.
